title: Charlie Shavers & Ray Bryant Quartet - Complete Recordings 2
description:
The Charlie Shavers & Ray Bryant Quartet - Complete Recordings Vol.2 1959-64 (2005)
              EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 389 Mb
                      Full Artwork @ 300 dpi (jpg) -> 43 Mb
                  

Sublime work from trumpeter Charlie Shavers – a player with a wonderful tone, and a clear, straightforward sound that was often sadly overlooked! The CD brings together the full tracks from 2 albums that Shavers recorded with pianist Ray Bryant – Memorial, from 1959, and Here Comes Charlie, from 1960 – both of them well-crafted sets that are a great example of Shaver's understated genius. The rhythms on both records are surprisingly complex – thanks to free drum work on the kit from Roy Burns, modern bass tones from Aaron Bell, and always-soulful work on piano from Ray Bryant – and if we had to pick one album as our favorite, we'd say that we're especially flored by the Here Comes Charlie set – as it goves far beyond even our already high opinion of Shaver's talents.

Contains:
- “Memorial” (complete LP)
- “Here Comes Charlie” (complete LP)
- “At Le Crazy Horse Saloon” (3 tracks)
